abstract: Berkshire Hathaway, the company controlled by Warren E. Buffett, says it has acquired a 10.9 percent stake in Burlington Northern Santa Fe, becoming the railroad company’s largest shareholder. Berkshire owned 39,027,430 shares of Burlington Northern with a market value of $3.23 billion as of April 5, according to a filing Friday with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Before Friday, Berkshire had not disclosed a stake in the railroad, America’s second-largest behind Union Pacific.
